name: Tangerine Hotel

reviews.text: Bargain, yet sheik. Friendly staff, clean, comfy down blanket, & great location if going to see a show at Warner Bros. lot. We walked there, takes 15 min. Would stay there anytime!
reviews.title: Sheik Bargain.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Can't be beat in the Burbank / Universal Area

reviews.text: Check-in was extremely easy, as I went through their website (which also had better rates than on travel sites, so check there first). The Manager charged me fully to my card at time of arrival, and there was no check-out necessary as it was done online.
reviews.title: A blast from my past

reviews.text: I stayed in room 232, which is a king room. The room was spacious enough, and came equipped with a fairly large closet which had multiple hangers, a warm blanket, a fold out luggage rack that came in handy, a dorm-sized refrigerator, small coffee maker, blow dryer, a Sony DreamMachine alarm clock, telephone, and a Sharp HD TV (I believe it was a 32").
reviews.title: "A TRUE HIDDEN GEM"

reviews.text: There is a nice size able area between the main room and the bathroom which has a large mirror and a wraparound shelf/table that holds the coffee maker, the refrigerator also sits underneath here.
reviews.title: Excellent! Splendid! Lovely!

reviews.text: Great place to stay when on a budget. Doesn't have all the conveniences of a higher star place but if you are tight for cash:
reviews.title: Great place to stay on a budget
Great hotel for tourists or business travelers
A contemporary revamp on the traditional 1960's independent motel.

description: Tangerine Hotel is a newly remodeled boutique hotel offering its guests an eclectic and colorful backdrop that promises to enhance any visit to Burbank, Hollywood and Los Angeles. Our thoughtfully appointed rooms are a fresh reinterpretation of the classic motel room; equipped with the requisite modern amenities and quality linens, we have also introduced elements to give each room a distinct personality that we hope our guests appreciate and enjoy.
